item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Ukraine’s Kursk offensive has triggered doubts among Russian elite, spy chiefs say
2. Oaktree calls out Advent and Silver Lake over collapsed start-up
3. [Opinion] The weird truth about work is we actually like it
4. Kamala Harris faces crucial debate as polls hint at slipping momentum
5. International house hunting for the non-doms
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
